Doria, 6, 95125 Catania, Italy; Italian National Institute of Nuclear Physics, Division of Catania, Via S. Sofia, 64, 95123 Catania, Italy</institution>           </aff>         </contrib>         <contrib contrib-type="author">           <name>             <surname>Carrubba</surname>             <given-names>Carla</given-names>           </name>           <aff>             <institution>Italian National Institute of Nuclear Physics, Division of Catania, Via S. Sofia, 64, 95123 Catania, Italy</institution>           </aff>         </contrib>         <contrib contrib-type="author">           <name>             <surname>Inserra</surname>             <given-names>Giuseppina</given-names>           </name>           <aff>             <institution>Italian National Institute of Nuclear Physics, Division of Catania, Via S. Sofia, 64, 95123 Catania, Italy</institution>           </aff>         </contrib>         <contrib contrib-type="author">           <name>             <surname>Ricceri</surname>             <given-names>Rita</given-names>           </name>           <aff>             <institution>Italian National Institute of Nuclear Physics, Division of Catania, Via S. Sofia, 64, 95123 Catania, Italy</institution>           </aff>         </contrib>         <contrib contrib-type="author">           <name>             <surname>Mayo-Garcia</surname>             <given-names>Rafael</given-names>           </name>           <aff>             <institution>Centro de Investigaciones Energ\ufffd\ufffdticas Medioambientales y Tecnol\ufffd\ufffdgicas (CIEMAT) Avenida Complutense, 40, 28040 Madrid, Spain</institution>           </aff>         </contrib>       </contrib-group>       <pub-date pub-type="pub">         <year>2013</year>       </pub-date>       <self-uri xlink:href="http://zenodo.org/record/7720"/>       <self-uri xlink:href="http://www.ubuntunet.net/uc2013_cfp"/>       <self-uri xlink:href="https://zenodo.org/record/7720/files/barberar.png?subformat=icon-90"/>       <self-uri xlink:href="https://zenodo.org/record/7720/files/barberar.pdf"/>     </article-meta>     <abstract><p>e-Infrastructures, and in particular Data Repositories and Open Access Data Infrastructures, are essential platforms for e-Science and e-Research and are being built since several years both in Europe and the rest of the world to support diverse multi/inter-disciplinary Virtual Research Communities. So far, however, it is difficult for scientists to correlate papers to datasets used to produce them and to discover data and documents in an easy way. In this paper, the CHAINREDS project&rsquo;s Knowledge Base and its Semantic Search Engine are presented, which attempt to address those drawbacks and contribute to the reproducibility of science.</p></abstract>   </front>   <article-type>user-fp7-chain-reds</article-type> </article>   </articles>
